resources.string: "Contacts permissions are needed for providing email completions."

The concentration of metals contained in electronic waste, especially for precious metal, is usually tens to hundards of times higher than that in natural deposits.Accoding to the research, human can extract 143 kg of copper, 0.5 kg of gold, 40.8 kg, 29.5 kg, 2.0 kg tin, lead, iron nickel 18.1 kg and 10.0 kg antimony from 1 ton of electronic boards
Recycle 1 electronic device，Obtain 1 glass, 1 metal, 1 plastic

Computer products contains substances, which can be harmful to the human body and environment.Therefore, we should not arbitrarily change the computer, to help reduce waste produce computers.If there are need to change, should try to use old computer recycling and recycled.Computer parts and materials, such as metal and plastic, etc., it can be recycled.Some obsolete computers as long as persist, can be restored as used to use again.

Made 1 ton of paper needs about 3 cubic meters of wood, the equivalent of two trees, Chinese paper consumption wood around 10 million cubic meters.Therefore, recycling waste paper manufacturing recycled paper can relieve the status of the paper making raw material shortage.In addition, the comprehensive utilization of waste paper there are many other ways to reduce pollution at the same time, also make full use of the waste paper recycling value.
Glass, exquisitely carved, non-toxic reusable, crushed brick or pave the way and can be made into environmental protection, but its recovery value lower than paper and plastic bottles
The vast majority of the ultimate fate of wood card board is to be regarded as useless junk and sent to landfills.

Old shoes!Who have no? Africa barefoot children are faced with threat from sand flea, there are college students launched the old shoes donation campaign, the city district residents can set collection stations, old shoes were sent to the university by joint logistics company again transferred to Africa.

With increasing plastic products consumption, waste plastic is also growing.At present, the waste plastics mainly for plastic film, plastic yarn and fabric, foam, plastic packaging and containers, daily plastic products, plastic bags, agricultural film and so on.

China automotive plastic consumption has reached 400000 tons, and electronic and electrical appliances with plastic consumption has more than 100 100 tons, the products scrapped after became one of the important sources of waste plastics.It is understood that in 2011, discharge waste plastics in China is about 28 million tons, 34.13 million tons in 2012
Greenpeace points out that Hong Kong people discard 110000 tons of fabric a year, equivalent to abandon a minute about 1400 pieces of t-shirts, enough to covered 25000 Hong Kong stadium.
Glass, exquisitely carved, non-toxic reusable, crushed brick or pave the way and can be made into environmental protection, but its recovery value lower than paper, plastic bottles

Metal recycling is separated from the scrap metal useful substances by physical or mechanical processing be recycled products, from recycling, dismantling, to recycling is one of the industrial chain.
Please connect to the internet first
